HTMLOutputElement.summary: The HTMLOutputElement interface provides properties and methods (beyond those inherited from ) for manipulating the layout and presentation of {{HTMLElement("output")}} elements.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: output.

HTMLOutputElement.value: The element goes into value mode when the contents of the value property are set. The value property otherwise behaves like the property. When the element is in value mode, the default value is accessible only through the defaultValue property.
